0.name: plain
0.info: The plain text, no other tags.

1.name: meta
1.info: Plain text + meta informations (title, description and keywords).

2.name: golub_2005
2.info: Plain text + title + headings + meta informations (title, description and keywords) (see GOLUB, ARDO, 'Importance of HTML Structural Elements and Metadata in Automated Subject Classification')

201.name: golub_2005_only_elements
201.info: Title + headings + meta informations (title, description and keywords) (see GOLUB, ARDO, 'Importance of HTML Structural Elements and Metadata in Automated Subject Classification')

3.name: özel_2011
3.info: Plain text + title + h1-h3 + b + strong + em + i + p + a + li (see ÖZEL, 'A web page classification system based on a genetic algorithm using tagged-terms as features')

301.name: özel_2011_only_elements
301.info: Plain text + title + h1-h3 + b + strong + em + i + p + a + li (see ÖZEL, 'A web page classification system based on a genetic algorithm using tagged-terms as features')
